subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: For more than seven years, Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal have maintained a stranglehold on tennis’s top spot. Novak Djokovic changed that with his victory at Wimbledon.
snippet: For more than seven years, Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal have maintained a stranglehold on tennis’s top spot. Novak Djokovic changed that with his victory at Wimbledon.
